arts.ttl: Portugal XI vs Hungary – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Portugal faces Hungary on Tuesday in the second match of their FIFA World Cup Qualifiers campaign. Roberto Martinez’s side will try to keep their winning run going while Hungary will be eager to bounce back after a 2-2 draw against Ireland. arts.ttl: Hungary vs Portugal live broadcast – Time and channel to watch the match
arts.sum: Portugal takes on Hungary this Tuesday at 8:45 PM (French time) in a match that will be broadcast on L’Equipe Live Foot. The game will take place at the Ferenc Puskás Stadium as part of the 2026 World Cup qualifying round.
